data.actual_result: The ´ character is detected as a slash, therefore opens the command list when you press CTRL + ´
data.expected_result: The ´ character is not detected as a slash
data.short_description: Discord detects the Acute Accent (U+00B4, `´`) character as a slash character and Diaresis (U+00A8, `¨`) (using Czech keyboard, press `\` on English keyboard) as a backslash character in keybinds
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a keyboard layout that does has the acute accent character on it (In this report, I'll use the Czech one) - Press CTRL + ´ (on Czech keyboard it should be the equal sign character, assuming you have English keyboard) or go to User Settings -> Keybinds -> Add a Keybind, press the record button, and press the aforementioned ´ character.
